title: Chhaava
stars: Vicky Kaushal, Akshaye Khanna, Rashmika Mandanna
description: A historical drama based on the life of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the son of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.

title: K.G.F
description: In the 1970s, a gangster named Rocky goes undercover as a slave to assassinate the owner of a notorious gold mine known as the Kolar Gold Fields.

title: Do Patti
description: A puzzling investigation leads a no-nonsense cop down a dark path involving the vicious rivalry between twin sisters and the volatile man they both love.

title: Ye Jawaani Hai Deewani
description: On a trekking trip, an introvert falls for a charming ex-classmate, whose thirst for adventure drives them apart. Years later, their paths cross again.

title: Pushpa
description: A labourer rises through the ranks of a red sandalwood smuggling syndicate, making some powerful enemies in the process.

title: Azaad
description: Set in the 1920s, a stablehand's dream of riding a high-spirited stallion lands him in the middle of India's fight for independence from British rule.

title: The Sabarmati Report
description: A Hindi reporter struggles with a deadly fact when a train full of Karsewaks is set ablaze in Godhra.

title: Jigra
stars: Alia Bhatt, Vedang Raina, Sikandar Kher
description: When Ankur is wrongfully imprisoned and sentenced to death in a foreign country, his steely sister Satya is driven by a lethal resolve to break him free.

title: Mr and Mrs Mahi
stars: Rajkumar Rao, Janhvi Kapoor, Rajesh Sharma
description: A married couple who share a love for cricket begin training in the game due to her natural talent.

title: Savi
description: Savi, a simple housewife, attempts a daring jailbreak to get her husband out of one of England's high-security prisons.

title: Srikanth
description: A visually-impaired man overcomes extreme obstacles in education and business in this biopic chronicling the life of industrialist Srikanth Bolla.

title: RRR
stars: Ram Charan, N.T. Rama Rao Jr., Ajay Devgn, Alia Bhatt
description: A fearless warrior on a perilous mission comes face to face with a steely cop serving British forces in this epic saga set in pre-independent India.

title: Dhoom Dhaam
description: An oddball couple is thrust into a chaotic chase, dodging goons and cops in a frenzied hunt for the mysterious 'Charlie'.

title: Salaar
stars: Prabhas, Prithviraj Sukumaran, Sriya Reddy, Shruti Hassan
description: In the crime-infested Khansaar, Prince Varadha sets to ascend the throne. But a coup d'Ã©tat is planned! And there's only one man to help reclaim power: Deva.

title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3
stars: Kartik Aaryan, Madhuri Dixit, Vidya Balan, Tripti Dimri
description: A fake ghostbuster is blackmailed into helping a royal family with their haunted palace, but dueling demonic possessions complicate matters.
